    • com.hellokaton.blade中Blade的使用

      返回Blade的com.hellokaton.blade中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Blade Blade.addLoader(@NonNull BladeLoader loader)
      Add blade loader
      Blade Blade.addStatics(String... folders)
      Add multiple static resource file the default provides the static, upload
      Blade Blade.after(@NonNull String path, @NonNull RouteHandler handler)
      Add a after route to routes, the before route will be executed after matching route
      Blade Blade.appName(@NonNull String appName)
      Set in the name of the app blade application
      Blade Blade.await()
      Await web server started
      Blade Blade.bannerText(String bannerText)
      Set blade start banner text
      Blade Blade.before(@NonNull String path, @NonNull RouteHandler handler)
      Add a before route to routes, the before route will be executed before matching route
      Blade Blade.bootConf(@NonNull String bootConf)
      Set to start blade configuration file by default Boot config properties file in classpath directory.
      Blade Blade.contextPath(String contextPath)
      Set context path, default is "/"
      Blade Blade.cors(CorsOptions corsOptions) 
      static Blade Blade.create()
      Give your blade instance, from then on will get the energy
      Blade Blade.delete(@NonNull String path, @NonNull RouteHandler handler)
      Add a delete route to routes
      Blade Blade.devMode(boolean devMode)
      Whether encoding setting mode for developers The default mode is developers
      Blade Blade.disableSession()
      Disable session, default is open
      Blade Blade.environment(Environment environment) 
      Blade Blade.event(@NonNull EventType eventType, EventListener eventListener)
      Add a event watcher When the trigger event is executed eventListener
      Blade Blade.exceptionHandler(ExceptionHandler exceptionHandler)
      Set ExceptionHandler, when you need a custom exception handling
      Blade Blade.get(@NonNull String path, @NonNull RouteHandler handler)
      Add a get route to routes
      Blade Blade.http(Consumer<HttpOptions> consumer) 
      Blade Blade.listen()
      Set to start the web server to monitor port, the default is 9000
      Blade Blade.listen(int port)
      Set to start the web server to monitor port, the default is 9000
      Blade Blade.listen(@NonNull String address, int port)
      Set to start the web server to listen the IP address and port The default will listen 0.0.0.0:9000
      static Blade Blade.of()
      已过时。 
      Blade Blade.on(@NonNull EventType eventType, EventListener eventListener)
      Add a event watcher When the trigger event is executed eventListener
      Blade Blade.post(@NonNull String path, @NonNull RouteHandler handler)
      Add a post route to routes
      Blade Blade.put(@NonNull String path, @NonNull RouteHandler handler)
      Add a put route to routes
      Blade Blade.register(@NonNull Class<?> cls)
      Register bean to ioc container
      Blade Blade.register(@NonNull Object bean)
      Register bean to ioc container
      Blade Blade.routerMapping(DynamicMapping dynamicMapping)
      set url router, default is RegexMapping if you want a faster router, you can set TrieMapping for example : routerMapping(new TrieMapping())
      Blade Blade.scanPackages(String... packages)
      When set to start blade scan packages
      Blade Blade.setEnv(String key, Object value) 
      Blade Blade.showFileList(boolean fileList)
      Set whether to show the file directory, default doesn't show
      Blade Blade.start(Class<?> mainCls, String... args)
      Start blade application
      Blade Blade.start(String... args)
      Start blade application.
      Blade Blade.templateEngine(@NonNull TemplateEngine templateEngine)
      Setting blade mvc default templateEngine
      Blade Blade.threadName(String threadName)
      Set blade start thread name
      Blade Blade.use(WebHook... middleware)
      The use of multiple middleware, if any
      Blade Blade.watchEnvChange(boolean watchEnvChange)
